mapper.sql: id, session_id, openid, message, worker, attention_date, attention_marketer, attention_nickName, create_date, update_date, message_type, opercode, from_user_id, to_user_id
mapper.select: SELECT sc.id AS session_id, sc.openid, sa.date AS attention_date, sa.nickname AS attention_nickName, sc.sys_user_id AS from_user_id, sc.sys_user_id_cs AS to_user_id, sd.name, sa.marketer as doctorName, sa.nickname AS senderName FROM consult_session sc INNER JOIN sys_attention sa ON sa.openid = sc.openid INNER JOIN sys_doctor sd ON sd.id = sc.sys_user_id_cs where sc.id = #{sessionId} GROUP BY sc.openid
mapper.insert: insert into consult_record (id, session_id, openid, message, worker, attention_date, attention_marketer, attention_nickName, create_date, update_date, message_type, opercode, from_user_id, to_user_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sessionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{message,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{worker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attentionDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{attentionMarketer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attentionNickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{messageType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fromUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{toUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:

session_id = #{sessionId,jdbcType=BIGINT},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
